question: Sharath Kamal and G Sathiyan duo, who were making news recently, is associated with which sports?
explanation:
Indian men\'s doubles pair-Sharath Kamal and Gnanasekaran Sathiyan recently won the silver medal at the ITTF World Tour Hungarian Open, held at Budapest.
They lost the hard-fought final match to the German pair of Benedikt Duda and Patrick Franziska. In the semi-finals, the Indian duo has defeated top seeds of Hong Kong. Sharath Kamal had earlier won bronze medal with Manika Batra in mixed doubles.
